description.english: Complete the tutorial and join the Hero Lodge.
Your Hero Lodge Team has reached the max rank.
Shieldmaiden interrupted 200 enemies.
Cosmic Knight used 100 Ultimates.
The Warden delayed 75 enrages.
The Frog hopped 600 times.
The Guardian has summoned 250 Sandmans.
The Holy One has diverted 1000 damage.
The Cultist has transfered 2000 life.
The Fairy has dispelled 100 debuffs.
The Dancer has danced 300 times.
The Wolf Shaman has given 500 AP with Invigorate.
The Pirate has fired 500 pistol shots
The Assassin has backstabbed 600 times.
The Huntress has shot 500 arrows.
The Dragoon has jabbed 2000 times.
The Alchemists have mixed 200 flasks.
The Dwarven Blacksmith has smelted 400 heroes.
Swordman has sheathed his sword 300 times.
The Martial Artist has gotten 200 First Bloods.
The Barbarian has spent 2000 HP on skills.
The Frost Ninja has shattered 400 times.
The Enchantress has enchanted 300 targets.
The Witch's Voodoo Doll has transfered 5000 damage.
The Archmage has Studied 420 times.
The Arcanist has fired 1500 Arcane Bolts.
The Arbormancer has created 150 Wood Golems.
The Guardian's Sandmen have been alive for 800 total turns.
The Wolf Shaman's Wolf has bitten 500 times.
The Alchemist Apprentice has tossed 325 stones.
The Ice Clone has been morphed into a Mega Shuriken 100 times.
The Wood Golem has walloped 250 times.
50 successful Material Hunts.
250 successful Material Hunts.
Randall the rat was spared.
Alex the Archer helped earn his vengence.
The legendary blade Caliburn was saved from the Rat Warlocks.
The Rat Queen was defeated in battle.
Lucky Charm awarded for opening all chests in A Rat Problem campaign.
The Lizard Defender was bribed.
The Enchantress was transformed into a Magical Shield.
The legendary Dragon Pike was found in the Lodge Strikes Back mission.
The Lizard God was defeated in battle.
Apron awarded for opening all chests in Reptile Wars campaign.
The Alchemists were killed instead of being allowed to join the lodge.
The legendary hammer Tempest was rewarded for having a perfected Dispel Magic potion.
The Master's Master was defeated in battle.
No goblins were slain on The Snitch mission.
No goblins were slain in the Chimerical Conflux campaign.
Magic Lantern awarded for opening all chests in Chimerical Conflux campaign.
Have 20 enemies with fully completed Bestiary Entries.
Have at least 25k gold saved up.
Deal over 100,000 total damage.
Complete first campaign only leveling heroes Randomly.
Complete one thousand Hero Lodge Missions.
Have a hero affected by both Enchant and Smelt at the same time.
Deal over one hundred damage in a single blow.
Score five critical hits in a row.
Damage an enemy that has negative 100 or less resist to the damage type dealt.
Have ten or more Action Points on a hero.
Equip the Rainbow Boots accessory.
Defeat the massive Cobalt Sentinel.
Soul Fragments transmuted into the Leviathan axe.
Soul Fragments transmuted into the Carnwennan dagger.
Philosopher was allowed to join the Hero Lodge.
Philosopher transmuted into the Chaos Talisman.
Shield ring awarded for opening all chests in Dracula Castle campaign.
Defeat the Dracula at the top of his tower.
Slay the Sandwurm in the Kerocia Desert.
Beat the Judgement Peak level starting from wave 1.
Saved 10 or more villagers from the Snow Curse.
Allowed the Statue to corrupt Caliburn, transforming it into Daliburn.
Destroy the statue of Bethiba instead of giving in to its unholy promise for power.
You broke the curse on the Cursed Scarab by getting 256 killing blows.
You dealt more than 2000 damage in a single turn against the Training Dummys.  (Without using cheats)
You saved the Blacksmith from the rat executioners.
You saved the Enchantress from the repulsive reptilian ritual.
The mighty Holy Dragon was defeated atop Judgement Peak.

displayName.english: I thought Hurricane Season Was over

description.english: Hit at least 5 targets with a single use of Hurricane.
Hero Medallion awarded for opening all chests in Illustrious Hunt campaign.
Got the "Sent to Hell" ending (less than -40 Karma when beating the game).
Got the "Heaven" ending (more than 50 Karma when beating the game).
Got a reunited with cat ending (50>=Karma>5 when beating the game).
Got a sad ending (5>=Karma>=-40 when beating the game).
Beat the game on Hard difficulty.
Beat the game while only leveling heroes Randomly.
Got the Secret Lizard God destroys everything ending.
Beat the game while only leveling the same attribute for all heroes.
Beat infernal difficulty!  Jay Wilson would be proud!
Power Ring awarded for opening all chests in Rat Rampage campaign.
Prismatic Orb awarded for opening all chests in Reptilian Riot campaign.
Fenrir's Charm awarded for opening all chests in Corruption Campaign.
Unlock 28 or more different Food Buff Recipes.
Static Earring awarded for opening all chests in Nightmare Castle Campaign.
Power Glove awarded for opening all chests in The Last Hunt Campaign.
Dyrnwyn was transformed into Demon's Bane by attacking Azazel.
You beat NG+ on infernal???
Great job beating NG+!
Shieldmaiden was tainted with demonic power!
You looted the vast majority of the ground items!  Wow!  How very thorough!
